scripts.test: npm run clean && istanbul cover _mocha && npm run jshint
scripts.build-electron: electron-packager . --overwrite --out builds --ignore tasks.json --ignore package-lock.json --ignore package.json --ignore config.json --icon=resources/icon.png
scripts.build-electron-all: npm run clean && npm run build-electron-win && npm run build-electron-linux && npm run build-electron-mac
scripts.build-electron-win: electron-packager . --overwrite --out builds --ignore tasks.json --ignore package-lock.json --ignore package.json --ignore config.json --platform=win32 --arch=x64 --icon=resources/icon.png
scripts.build-electron-linux: electron-packager . --overwrite --out builds --ignore tasks.json --ignore package-lock.json --ignore package.json --ignore config.json --platform=linux --arch=x64 --icon=resources/icon.png
scripts.build-electron-mac: electron-packager . --overwrite --out builds --ignore tasks.json --ignore package-lock.json --ignore package.json --ignore config.json --platform=darwin --arch=x64 --icon=resources/icon.png
